text:
As of 2024-12-31, BAC reported:
- Total assets: 3.26 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 296.49 billion USD
- Total debt: 326.67 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 272.40 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 203.38 billion USD
- Net debt: 30.18 billion USD

As of 2023-12-31, BAC reported:
- Total assets: 3.18 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 341.42 billion USD
- Total debt: 334.30 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 263.25 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 194.23 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2022-12-31, BAC reported:
- Total assets: 3.05 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 237.46 billion USD
- Total debt: 302.91 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 244.80 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 175.78 billion USD
- Net debt: 65.45 billion USD

As of 2021-12-31, BAC reported:
- Total assets: 3.17 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 355.37 billion USD
- Total debt: 303.87 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 245.36 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 176.34 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2020-12-31, BAC reported:
- Total assets: not available
- Cash and cash equivalents: not available
- Total debt: not available
- Common stock equity: not available
- Tangible book value: not available
- Net debt: not available
